creator: bluewolf.chung@gmail.com

text: I'm doing tasks that port Tomcat 7 Jasper to our WAS product these days. But I couldn't change the package name of tag classes without editing org.apache.jasper.compiler.JspUtil#getTagHandlerClassName().
creator: bluewolf.chung@gmail.com

text: Thanks for the report. Fixed in trunk and 7.0.x and will be included in 7.0.27 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
